top_comments.comment: Why no one is talking about Kerala the Only state which is having over 6000 cases per day and more than  50%  of totall country wide cases

comments_since_last_sample.body: 2 solid years of this now and how many people do you honestly know of that "died of covid" without the presence of unrelated terminal illness?
